author: SFENCE

game.author: Wuzzy
game.name: hades_revisited
game.short_description: Work in Progress. You have stranded on the planet Hades. Use your limited supplies to survive and use terraforming to create a beautiful habitable place. (EARLY TEST VERSION)
game.title: Hades Revisited

long_description:
[Shared forum topic](https://forum.minetest.net/viewtopic.php?t=26747)

Port of [skinsdb](https://content.minetest.net/packages/bell07/skinsdb/), modified for compatibility with [Hades Revisited](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).

In github code follow branch [sfence_hades_revisited](https://github.com/sfence/skinsdb/tree/sfence_hades_revisited).

See origin skinsdb mod for more details.
name: hades_skinsdb
short_description: Custom player skins manager with support for 1.0 and 1.8er skins and inventory skins selector for Hades Revisited
title: SkinsDB for Hades Revisited
